vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.13;
son of: Reuel (H7467);
brother of: Zerah (H2226), Shammah (H8048) and Mizzah (H4199)
§ Nahath = "rest"
1) one of the dukes of Edom, son of Reuel and grandson of Esau
2) a Kohathite Levite, son of Zophai and grandson of Elkanah
3) an Levite overseer in the time of Hezekiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Reuel, hijo de Esaú; (b) תֹּחוּ ,תּוֹח   hijo de Sofai, Suf; descendiente de Elcaná; tribu de Leví; (c)   levita; en tiempos del rey Ezequías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿哈 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "休息"
1) 以東族長之一, 流珥的兒子且是以掃的孫子 (代上 1:37)
2) 哥轄利未人, 瑣菲之子且是以利加拿的孫子 (代上 6:26)
3) 在西希家時代的利未監督 (代下 31:13)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
拿哈 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "休息"
1) 以东族长之一, 流珥的儿子且是以扫的孙子 (代上 1:37)
2) 哥辖利未人, 琐菲之子且是以利加拿的孙子 (代上 6:26)
3) 在西希家时代的利未监督 (代下 31:13)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.31.13
§ Nahath = "rest"
1) one of the dukes of Edom, son of Reuel and grandson of Esau
2) a Kohathite Levite, son of Zophai and grandson of Elkanah
3) an Levite overseer in the time of Hezekiah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.1.1;
son of: Zuph (H6689);
father of: Elihu (H0453); also called Nahath at 1Ch.6.26; Toah at 1Ch.6.34;
Another name of to.chu (תֹּחוּ "Tohu" H8459)
§ Nahath = "rest"
1) one of the dukes of Edom, son of Reuel and grandson of Esau
2) a Kohathite Levite, son of Zophai and grandson of Elkanah
3) an Levite overseer in the time of Hezekiah
